text: Peş az in niz Jusuf ʙo daloili ravşan nazdaton omad, ammo şumo az on ci ʙarojaton ovarda ʙud, pajvasta dar şak ʙuded, to zamone, ki az dunjo raft [va ʙar tardidaton afzuda şud]. On goh gufted: «Alloh taolo hargiz pas az vaj pajomʙarero maʙ'us naxohad kard». Alloh taolo isrofkori ʙadgumonro in guna gumroh mesozad
